pages.text: Imbued with unknown technology, this block will spawn $(6)mobs$() at a fast rate when certain conditions are met.$(br2)Firstly, it requires $(6)1000$()RF and $(6)20mb$() of $(6)Liquid Meat$() per operation, secondly, normal mob spawn conditions have to be met (this means the light level has to be $(6)7$() or lower and the block has to be loaded)$(br2)
When one block is supplied with $(6)Power$() or $(6)Liquid Meat$(), it will automatically be equally divided by any connected blocks.
